Translations.Text: Ware wa, sore (doro) kara anata gata o tsukuri, soreni anata gata o kaera se, mata sore kara imaichido hikidasu nodearu
Ware wa kare (firuaun) ni, subete no waga shirushi o shimeshita nodaga, kare wa kyogidearu to shite kyohi shita
Kare wa itta. `Musa yo, anata gata wa majutsu de, kono kuni kara watashi-tachi o oidasu tame ni kita no ka
Sorenara, watashi-tachi mo sono yona majutsu o anata ni mochidasou. Sa, watashi-tachi to anata no ma de yakusoku shite kokai no basho o sadame, watashi-tachi mo anata mo sore o tagaenai yo ni shiyou
Kare (musa) wa itta. `Anata to no kaigo no yakusoku wa,-sai no hidearu. Hitobito o hirumae ni o atsume kudasai
Sokode firuaun wa hikitori, yagate keikaku o nette (kaette) kita

Musa wa kare-ra ni itta. `Anata gata wa wazawai ni audarou. Kare ga anata gata o shobatsu shite horobosa reru koto no nai yo, arra ni taishi netsuzo shi, uso o itte wa naranai. (Uso o) netsuzo suru mono wa kanarazu shippai suru
Sokode kare-ra wa otagai ni saku o nette ronji attaga, mochiron sono sodan wa himitsu ni shita
Kare-ra wa itta. `Tashikani ryonin wa majutsu-shidearu. Kare-ra wa ano majutsu de anata gata o kokudo kara oidashi, anata gata no sugureta narawashi o konzetsu shiyou to nozonde iru
Sorede kakuji no keikaku o neri, sorekara retsu o nashite takare. Kyo shori o eru mono wa, kanarazu sakaeru nodearu
Kare-ra wa itta. `Musa yo, anata ga nageru ka, soretomo watashi-tachi ga saki ni nageyou ka
Kare (musa) wa itta. `Iya, anata gataga sakini nage nasai.' Suru to miruga i. Kare ni wa nawa to tsue ga, majutsu de (ikite) hashiru ka no yo ni mieta
Sore de musa wa, sukoshi kokoro ni osore o kanjita
Ware wa itta. `Osoreru ni wa oyobanai. Hontoni anata ga jozudearu
Anata no migite ni aru mono o nage nasai. Kare-ra ga tsukutta mono o nomikome. Majutsu-shi no gomakashi nisuginai. Majutsu-shi wa doko kara kite mo,(nanigoto mo) seiko shinai
Sokode majutsu-shi-tachi wa, fuku shite sajida shi,`watashi-tachi wa, musa to harun no omo o shinko shimasu.' To itta

Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Watashi ga yurusanai naka ni, kare o shinjiru no ka. Hontoni kare wa, anata gata ni majutsu o oshieta anata gata no tomokudearou. Anata gata no ryote to ryoashi o tagaichigai ni setsudan shite, natsumeyashi no kan ni haritsuke ni surudearou. Anata gata wa dochira no chobatsu ga yori genjude, eizoku suru ka kanarazu wakarudearou

Kare-ra (majutsu-shi) wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, watashi-tachi ni shimesa reta meihakuna shirushi, mata watashi-tachi o sozo nasa reta kare ijo ni, anata o omonjiru koto wa fukanodesu. Sorede anata no kettei sa reru koto o jisshi shite kudasai. Daga anata wa, gense no seikatsu ni oite dake, hanketsu nasaru ni sugimasen

Hontoni watashi-tachi ga omo o shinko suru no wa, watashi-tachi no go Chino o yurushi o koi, mata anata ga murijideshita majutsu ni taishite, o yurushi o kou tamedearimasu. Arra wa shizen ni shite towa ni iki rareru kata de ara remasu
Tsumibito to shite omo no omoto ni kuru mono ni wa, hontoni jigoku ga aru. Sono Chu de kare wa shi mo naku nama mo nai
Daga, oku no zenko o shite, shinja to shite kare no moto ni kita mono ni wa takai ikai o ataeru
Kare (shinja) wa eien ni kawa ga shita o nagareru adon (eden) no rakuen ni sumu nodearu. Kore wa, jibun o junketsu ni mamotta mono e no hoshodearu

Ware wa musa ni keiji shita. `Ware no shimo be-tachi to tomoni yoru ni tabidatte, kare-ra (Isuraeru no min) no tame ni, umi no naka ni kawaita michi o (anata no tsue de) uchi ake. (Firuaun no gunzei ni) oitsuka reru koto o shinpai suru na. Mata (umi o) kowagaru koto wanai
Hatashite firuaun wa, gunzei o hikiite kare-ra (Isuraeru no min) o ottaga, kaisui ga kare-ra o kanzen ni suichu ni shizume otte shimatta
(Ko no yo ni) firuaun wa sono min o mayowa se, tadashiku michibikanakatta nodearu
Isuraeru no shison yo, ware wa anata gata o teki kara sukui, mata (Shinai) yama no migigawa de anata gata to yakusoku o musubi, Man'na to uzura o anata gata ni kudashita

(Soshite ware wa itta. ) `Ware ga anata gata ni sazuketa yoi mono o tabe nasai. Saritote ware no ikari ga anata gata ni kudaranai yo,-ho o koete wa naranai. Dare demo ware no ikari ni fureru mono wa, kanarazu horobiru
Daga kaigo shite shinko shi, zenko ni isoshimi, sonogo (tadashiku) michibika reru mono ni wa, ware wa tabitabi kan'yo o shimesu
